doc:
Iva Shepard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iva_Shepard 0 Iva Shepard (April 23, 1886, Cincinnati, Ohio – January 26, 1973, Arcadia, California) was an American silent film actress. Her most notable film roles were as Zoe Trevor in The Haunted Manor (1916) and as Nettie Lea in The Isle of Love (1916). Late in her career, she made guest appearances in two 1955 episodes of the hit TV show I Love Lucy: "Nursery School" and "Don Juan and the Starlets", as a nurse and maid, respectively. These two roles provided fans who remembered her a chance to hear her voice for what may have been the first time, since she did not appear in films after 1918. Iva_Shepard ( April_23_,_1886 , Cincinnati , Ohio – January_26_,_1973 , Arcadia , California ) was an_American_silent_film_actress . Her_most_notable_film_roles were as Zoe_Trevor in The_Haunted_Manor_(_1916_) and as Nettie_Lea in The_Isle of Love_(_1916_) . Late in her_career , she made guest_appearances in two_1955_episodes of the_hit_TV_show I Love_Lucy : " Nursery_School_"_and_"_Don_Juan and the_Starlets " , as a_nurse_and_maid , respectively . These_two_roles provided fans who remembered her a_chance to_hear her_voice for what may_have_been the_first_time , since she did_not_appear in films after 1918 .
